description: "Avo-Keto" is a new, healthy cocktail recipe that's surprisingly delicious and easy to make. This fresh take on the classic margarita combines avocado, tequila, and lime in a delicious&nbsp;keto drink.With only a few ingredients, all of your friends will love this sweet and sour cocktail at your next get-together! We hope you enjoy our recipe for Avo-Keto Margarita!
name: Avo-Keto Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the tequila, lime juice, avocado, and salt into a blender with 2.5 cups of crushed ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the tequila, lime juice, avocado, and salt into a blender with 2.5 cups of crushed ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a rocks glass rimmed with chili lime salt over ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a rocks glass rimmed with chili lime salt over ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro and lime. Serve
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro and lime. Serve
